General.Name: Argha Karya Prima Ind Tbk
General.Description: PT Argha Karya Prima Industry Tbk manufacturers, markets, trades, and distributes flexible packaging films in Indonesia, Africa, the Americas, the Middle East, Europe, Australia, and New Zealand. It operates through two segments, Manufacturing and Distribution. It offers biaxially oriented poly propylene films and polyester films. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Bogor, Indonesia. PT Argha Karya Prima Industry Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Nawa Panduta.
